channel.title: Two Problems

item.title: Two Problems
item.dc:creator: @gangsta_tony gangsta tony
item.description:
@gangsta_tony wrote:

I want to know how to do these 2.
Change the Chatbox look/picture when I don’t have a Sprites folder
When someone is a donator, it shows a different message as a non-donor in sidebar interface 7

[code] setSidebarInterface(7, 19510); // donor tab

if(officialClient){
if(Donator > 0){
setSidebarInterface(7, 19500);} // clan chat

}[/code]it still doesn’t work

Read full topic
